bug.author: brollb
bug.summary: Incorrect sizing on execution tray in firefox
bug.description: Although firefox is not officially supported, this is still annoying and should be an easy fix <denchmark-link:https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/4982789/21573104/48807870-cea6-11e6-8c01-d4f225ee0b83.png></denchmark-link>
